trans-unit.source: Represents the hosted combo box control in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" /> 中承载的组合框控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl> interface, allowing it to be hosted in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> when the cell is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>类是特殊的类型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridViewEditingControl>接口，使其能够承载于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>当单元格处于编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> is in edit mode, you can retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>是在编辑模式，你可以检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControl%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing>事件时要执行的编辑控件的自定义初始化在单元格进入编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义控件的显示特征，设置返回的对象的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，而不是设置的属性返回的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing?displayProperty=nameWithType> event handler to add a handler for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing?displayProperty=nameWithType>要添加的处理程序的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>事件。

trans-unit.source: In the example, the editing control is cast to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，编辑控件被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>来处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This default constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此默认构造函数设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Application code typically will not explicitly create instances of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl> class, because this is performed automatically when the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> is created.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序代码通常不会显式创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl>类，因为自动执行此操作时包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>创建。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> to use as a pattern for the UI.
trans-unit.target: 要用作用户界面模式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes the control's user interface (UI) to be consistent with the specified cell style.
trans-unit.target: 更改控件的用户界面 (UI)，使之与指定单元格样式一致。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> properties of the control align with the corresponding properties of the `dataGridViewCellStyle` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>控件的属性的相应属性的对齐`dataGridViewCellStyle`参数值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 为此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl" /> 实例创建新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: A new accessibility object.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的可访问性对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the combo box control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含组合框控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" /> that contains this control; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if there is no associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 作为包含此控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的容器的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell" />；否则，如果不存在关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is automatically set when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell> is created within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性时自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxColumn>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxCell>中创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>或添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the formatted representation of the current value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此控件的当前值的格式化表示形式。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the current value of this control.
trans-unit.target: 表示此控件的当前值的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A> property contains the actual data contained in the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.Text%2A>属性包含在控件中包含的实际数据。

trans-unit.source: This data is the string shown in the text box portion of the control.
trans-unit.target: 此数据是显示在控件的文本框部分的字符串。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl.GetEditingControlFormattedValue%2A> method returns the formatted representation of this string.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl.GetEditingControlFormattedValue%2A>方法返回此字符串的格式的表示。

trans-unit.source: Because a combo box uses plain text strings, these two properties are essentially the same.
trans-unit.target: 由于组合框使用纯文本字符串，这两个属性是实质上是相同的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the owning cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所属单元格的父行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row that contains the owning cell; -1 if there is no owning row.
trans-unit.target: 包含所属单元格的行的索引；如果没有所属行，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the column headers row is -1.
trans-unit.target: 列标题行的行索引为-1。

trans-unit.source: The row index of a shared row is also -1.
trans-unit.target: 一个共享行的行索引还为-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the current value of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于指示控件的当前值是否已更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of the control has changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件的值已更改，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl.EditingControlValueChanged%2A> property is set to `true` to specify that the owning cell's value has changed, and the cell may need to be updated to reflect this change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxEditingControl.EditingControlValueChanged%2A>属性设置为`true`指定所属单元格的值已更改，并且该单元格可能需要进行更新以反映此更改。

trans-unit.source: The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after it has updated itself.
trans-unit.target: 所属的单元格或表将重置此属性设置为`false`更新自身后。

trans-unit.source: When the control is initialized, this property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 初始化控件时，此属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key that was pressed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值的按位组合，表示所按下的键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control can process the key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件能够处理该键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key that the editing control should process or a special key that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> should process.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是应由编辑控件处理的常规输入键，还是应由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key that should be handled by the editing control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的键是应由编辑控件处理的常规输入键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control calls this method to determine whether to handle an input key or let the editing control handle it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件调用此方法以确定是否处理输入的键，或让编辑控件处理它。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if `keyData` includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Up> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Down> values or if the drop-down list is displayed and `keyData` includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Escape> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Enter> values.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`true`如果`keyData`包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Up>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Down>值或如果显示了下拉列表和`keyData`包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Escape>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys.Enter>值。

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `true` if `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` 为 `true`，此方法也会返回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法返回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cursor used during editing.
trans-unit.target: 获取编辑期间使用的光标。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> that represents the cursor image used by the mouse pointer during editing.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" />，表示鼠标指针在编辑期间使用的光标图像。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> values that specifies the data error context.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts" /> 值的按位组合，用于指定数据错误上下文。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 检索单元格的格式化值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the formatted version of the cell contents.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示单元格内容的格式化版本。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select all of the cell's content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="true" />，则选择单元格的全部内容；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the currently selected cell for editing.
trans-unit.target: 准备当前选中的单元格以进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the cell contents need to be repositioned whenever the value changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示是否需要在每次值更改时重新定位单元格内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。
